# Calendrier

[Calendrier Coll√®ge Montmorency 2020-2021 ](https://www.cmontmorency.qc.ca/wp-content/uploads/images/college/administration/CALENDRIER-SCOLAIRE-2020-2021.pdf){target="_blank"}

```{r calendrier, fig.cap="Calendrier 2021", echo=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
CALENDRIER <- read.csv(file = 'medias/calendrier/2021.csv', header = TRUE)
knitr::kable(CALENDRIER, caption = 'Calendrier', booktabs = TRUE, col.names = gsub("[.]", " ", names(CALENDRIER))) %>%
    column_spec(column=1, width= "1em") %>%
    column_spec(column=2, width= "10em") %>%
    column_spec(column=3, width= "10em")
```
